title: Is there a two page spread in Google Docs? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you mean viewing “2-up”, so two pages side by side like when you read a book, then the answer is no - although Google seem aware of the desire for this functionality. See Is it possible to view Multiple Pages in one Google Doc? I know this is a feature on word.

From Google search: At this time Docs doesn't support a two-page spread. However, you can open the same document in two different windows and then resize the windows to have different pages side by side. Mar 6, 2019
